subject: JUnit 4.x and support for Java 1.4
msgSnippet: Kent (and other JUnit 4 developers) – has any consideration been given to support Java 1.4 with JUnit 4.xx. The use of annotations – could be replaced with
messageBody:
Kent (and other JUnit 4 developers) � has any consideration been given to
support Java 1.4 with JUnit 4.xx. The use of annotations � could be replaced
with doc comments. Unfortunately some of us work in corporate environments
where use of Java 1.5 will take at least another couple of years (we only
just dropped support for Java 1.3). Can you for see support for Java 1.4 are
must we look to TestNG to fulfill our needs?
Thanks
Mark Levison
